text: The Provincial Highways of Gilgit-Baltistan consists of all public highways maintained by Gilgit-Baltistan, Pakistan. The Gilgit-Baltistan Highway Department under the Planning & Development Department maintains over of roadways organised into various classifications which crisscross the province and provide access to major population centers. These are not to be confused with national highways which are federal roads maintained by the Government of Pakistan and the National Highway Authority. ==List of Provincial Highways== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:auto; font-size:90%; align:center; text- align:center; width:90%" |colspan="12" bgcolor="#E0E0E0"|Provincial Highways of Gilgit-Baltistan |- !
